name: Georgia State University
former_names: Georgia Tech Evening School of Commerce, (1913-1947);, Atlanta Division of the University of Georgia, (1947-1955);, Georgia State College of Business Administration, (1955-1961);, Georgia State College, (1961-1969)

athletics: NCAA Division I – Sun Belt Conference
